title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.19 - Consideration and determination of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.19 - Consideration and determination of appeal

State Regulations

Before the end of the next business day following the day
of filing of an appeal, the chairman or president of the city board may by
filing an order designate a panel of three city board members to consider and
determine the appeal. If no such panel is designated, the city board shall
consider and determine the appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
